groups.name: spring.ai.alibaba.webclient
groups.description: Configuration properties for WebClient connection pooling to prevent connection reset errors.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.webclient.max-connections
properties.description: Maximum number of connections per host.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.webclient.max-idle-time
properties.description: Maximum time a connection can be idle before being evicted. This helps prevent 'Connection reset' errors when the server closes idle connections.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.webclient.max-life-time
properties.description: Maximum time a connection can live.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.webclient.eviction-interval
properties.description: Interval for evicting idle connections in background.
